message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be interested in!  I'm offering it to you for $150.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $80 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $120.  Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $120 is still a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
